features: 【Small but Powerful】 Only 8 inch compact table fan has High Powered 26W Motor. Powerful electric motor is strong air circulator and provides an intense feeling of cool air, cooling your room, bed side, bedroom, office, or indoor kitchen.

【2 Adjustable Speeds】With high and low wind speed settings, Dr. Prepare desk fan allows you to have easy control of wind for the tailored cooling experience. High speed help you cool down quickly, Low speed provides you with high quality sleep.
【Improve Air Circulation】 Twisted spiral grilles design circulates all the air in your whole room fast and constantly. Always stay cool and comfortable on hot and humid days.
【Regulate Temperature】Efficiently circulates the cool or warm wind throughout the room , cooling your summer and warming your winter, reducing air conditioner and heater energy costs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dr. Prepare offers premium quality products and professional services to customers worldwide. Powerful, Sturdy Small Fan Dr. Prepare 8 inch table fan with compact size, minimalistic look and high quality is ready to cool you off in hot summer. A knob make your room cooling， which allows you to turn on/off the portable fan and select a speed setting. 8 inch compact size 2 speed settings 120V AC power plug 3 topple-resistant rubber pedestals

2 Speed Settings The high mode cools you off in hot summer days while the low mode creates an ultra quiet breeze helping you cool when sleeping at night. Compact Size Medium in size to keep your space comfortable, making it a great addition to table tops, bedside, sleeping room, kitchen counters, and office desks, camping etc.. High Power Brushless Motor Adopted with a powerful and high-quality motor, this fan creates a strong and focused air flow, is perfect for hot summer days where you need to keep cool. High wind speed, quiet white noise.

Air Tensity Spiral Grill The special design of twisted spiral grilles creates more powerful airflow and allows the air to travel throughout the whole room. Whole Room Air Circulation Circulates all the air in your room to improve air movement, keeping cooling constantly and helping reduce conditioner energy costs. Powerful yet Comfortable Comparing with other traditional fan, Dr. Prepare table fan produces stronger and more steady wind, giving you better cooling experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan: Powerful Cooling in a Compact and Portable Design
reviews.reviewText: The Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan is a game-changer when it comes to keeping cool and comfortable in any space. With its powerful airflow, whisper-quiet operation, adjustable speeds, and portable design, this 8-inch table fan is the perfect companion for your desk, bedside, or any area where you need a refreshing breeze.The standout feature of this desk fan is its powerful cooling capabilities. Despite its compact size, the Dr. Prepare Desk Fan packs a punch with its strong airflow. Whether you're working at your desk, sleeping at night, or simply relaxing in your favorite chair, this fan delivers a refreshing breeze that helps keep you cool and comfortable during hot and humid days.What sets the Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan apart is its whisper-quiet operation. The fan's advanced brushless motor ensures smooth and quiet performance, allowing you to work, sleep, or relax without any disruptive noise. Enjoy a peaceful and productive environment without sacrificing the cool comfort provided by this fan.This desk fan offers two adjustable speeds to cater to your specific cooling needs. Choose between the low-speed setting for a gentle breeze or the high-speed setting for a more powerful airflow. The user-friendly control panel allows for easy and convenient speed adjustment, putting you in control of your desired level of comfort.The portable design of the Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan adds to its versatility. With its compact size and lightweight construction, you can easily move it from one room to another or take it with you on your travels. Whether you need a cooling companion for your office, bedroom, dorm room, or even outdoor activities, this fan is ready to provide refreshing airflow wherever you go.Additionally, the Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan is built to last. Its sturdy construction ensures durability, while the high-quality materials used in its design guarantee long-term performance. The fan's grille is removable, making it easy to clean and maintain, ensuring that it remains in optimal condition for continued use.In conclusion, the Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan is the perfect solution for powerful cooling in a compact and portable design. With its strong airflow, whisper-quiet operation, adjustable speeds, and portable convenience, this 8-inch table fan is an essential tool for staying cool and comfortable in any space. Upgrade your comfort level with the Dr. Prepare Quiet Desk Fan and enjoy a refreshing breeze whenever and wherever you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small room fan
reviews.reviewText: It is the perfect size for a bedroom. Keeps the air circulating even though it is winter I like the air moving so it doesn’t get stuffy. It’s the perfect little fan Thanks Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: I actually have mine on the floor in a corner set on speed two. There are only two speeds, a third would be better. Although it isn’t hot here now - I live in North-Central Florida, a third higher speed would be fantastic in warmer months.Fan is actually smaller than I thought but it does a decent job of circulating ac cooled air in my living room. I suspect it’ll also will help circulate central heat soon.Quality is fine. I think it’s somewhat overpriced. An oscillating option is something that would make this fan a great deal.As stated flow is pretty good. This is mid-November so time will tell if only 2 speeds can do the job inFL heat.Fan is very quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent small fan
reviews.reviewText: I had two small Duracraf fans, but one burned out in Ireland (I had a converter that apparently didn’t work) so I needed a new fan. I looked high and low for a replacement Duracraft and couldn’t find one. I settle on this fan. It works fantastic as a personal fan. I also use it for white noise when I travel and it has what I consider the perfect noise level. That doesn’t mean it’s noisy, it’s not, it’s a fan. It actually seems to move more air than the Duracraft. One improvement is they put rubber pads on the stand that help keep it in place when changing the setting. Overall a great little fan and well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful for the size!
reviews.reviewText: Great fan that is not overwhelming big. Powerful enough to keep you comfortable when the ac isn’t able to keep up in the heat. It is also not incredibly loud, like many others. The price is very reasonable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good air movement, no tilt feature
reviews.reviewText: The fan itself is great. Good airflow, good sound (not too quiet, not too loud, just enough white noise to be soothing), but I did not realize that it does not have a tilt feature. Once it sits on the counter, you can turn it left or right (obviously), but the fan does not tilt up or down to direct airflow in a specific direction. It is one static piece, so you have to be sure the fan is placed at a certain height to get the airflow directed where you want it to go. I wanted to place it on a high shelf and tilt the blades to direct the airflow down, but with no tilt feature, the airflow is blowing over my head and not down to where the airflow is needed. Propping something under the legs to the whole fan is tilted in the direction the airflow is needed will make the fan unstable. Be sure to know where you will want to place the fan to ensure the airflow will be where you want it to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
